Package simu.model

Class Customer

java.lang.Object
simu.model.Customer
public class Customer extends Object
The Customer class represents a customer in the simulation. It contains information about the customer's arrival time, removal time, ID, and flight type (EU or non-EU). The class also provides methods to report results and manage customer IDs.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Customer(long isEUFlight, Controller controller)
    Initializes a Customer instance and determines whether the customer is on an EU flight.

  • Constructor Details

    • Customer

      public Customer(long isEUFlight, Controller controller)
      Initializes a Customer instance and determines whether the customer is on an EU flight. The EU flight status is set based on the provided parameter.
      Parameters:
      isEUFlight - A numeric value indicating if the flight is an EU flight (1 for true, otherwise false).
      controller - The controller instance can be null in test environments.

  • Method Details

    • getRemovalTime

      public double getRemovalTime()
      Returns the removal time for the customer.
      Returns:
      The time when the customer is removed.

    • setRemovalTime

      public void setRemovalTime(double removalTime)
      Sets the removal time for the customer.
      Parameters:
      removalTime - The time when the customer is removed.

    • getArrivalTime

      public double getArrivalTime()
      Returns the arrival time for the customer.
      Returns:
      The time when the customer arrived.

    • setArrivalTime

      public void setArrivalTime(double arrivalTime)
      Sets the arrival time for the customer.
      Parameters:
      arrivalTime - The time when the customer arrived.

    • getIsEUFlight

      public boolean getIsEUFlight()
      Determines whether the flight is an EU flight.
      Returns:
      true if the flight is an EU flight, false otherwise.

    • getId

      public int getId()
      Returns the ID of the customer.
      Returns:
      The unique identifier for the customer.

    • reportResults

      public void reportResults(Controller controller)
      Reports the results of the customer's service. Logs the arrival and removal times, the total time spent in the system, the flight type, and the current mean service time.
      Parameters:
      controller - The controller instance can be null in test environments.

    • resetIdCounter

      public static void resetIdCounter()
      Resets the static ID counter for the Customer class. This method should be called at the beginning of each new simulation.

    • startWaiting

      public void startWaiting()
      Starts the waiting time for the customer. This method should be called when the customer starts waiting for service.

    • stopWaiting

      public void stopWaiting()
      Stops the waiting time for the customer. This method should be called when the customer stops waiting for service.

    • getTotalWaitingTime

      public double getTotalWaitingTime()
      Returns the total waiting time for the customer.
      Returns:
      The total waiting time in time units.

    • getTotalTimeInSystem

      public double getTotalTimeInSystem()
      Returns the total time the customer spent in the system.
      Returns:
      The total time in the system in time units.
